terms_of_service.Data safety: This application contains sensitive data. Please do not leave the device unattended while being logged in to avoid unintended data dissemination. Be aware sensitive data can be compromised by taking screenshots or switching apps, avoid exposure of the contents outside of the application. If you export sensitive data outside of the application you are responsible for a secure handling. Even with a disabled device the application my be still active in the background. On connection loss sensitive data is stored on the device. Please make sure to gain network access as soon as possible to flush the data to the server for safety and consistent documentation reasons. Log out of the application if unused and do not leave it unattended. Use only valid devices to ensure a safe data handling. In case of a lost access token inform a user of following permission groups immediately: :permissions
terms_of_service.Your data: This application is part of quality management control. Your data is necessary for documentation and ressource management. You can check your data within your profile. Some data may have to be set by a member of the administration, other can be set and appended by yourself. In case your account is deleted, sent messages and common used information (orders, checks, approvals, your name as author and contributor to documentation) remain within the system due to legitimate interest of consistent documentation and operational procedures.
terms_of_service.Device permissions: This application requests permission to use a camera and send notifications. Camera access may be neccessary to append photos to documentation and scan 2D-codes. Latter can be achieved by a dedicated terminal device. You may not be able to log in without this permission and limit your documentation abilities. Notifications inform about new in-app messages and support a better work condition. You may revoke the permissions through the browser settings.
terms_of_service.Feedback: If you experience any issues with data security or application usage contact :issue_mail immidiately providing details and a response address.

application.terms_of_service_accepted: I agree to the terms of service

component.components_info_content:
Choose available elements from this panel. Set your parameters and add fields. Be specific with input names and try to avoid repeating names within components and documents. Add a hint when in doubt.
 
Change your order by dragging the elements. During composing indicators for containers might not be available. Dragging is available on devices with mice only. You can relocate or delete elements with right-click as well. Reordered images will disappear but still saved.
 
To edit an existing element you can drag it onto its creation mask to import its values. You have to delete and reinsert the element, and it doesn't work for images though.
component.context_missing_identifier: This context requires an identifier field. Please add a component with an identifier!
component.elect_hint: If you want an entry (e.g. the first) not to submit a value enter ... as a value.
component.radio: Add a set of single selection options
component.range_step_hint: Positive numerical values, float values or literally 'any', 1 by default
component.raw_hint: Make sure to understand the assemblers syntax to proceed with this advanced option. You can just specify the content.
component.raw_json_error: There appears to be an issue with your JSON-syntax.
component.signature_hint: Remember this signature not being document proof for lacking certification
component.text: Add a single line text input
component.texttemplate: Add button to access text templates

record.append_missing_document: Some documents seem not be be taken into account. Append missing data now:
record.assign_hint: "My units" lists all records for your assigned units. "Not assignable" means the last editing user has been deleted. The next addition by a qualified user reassigns the unit.
record.complaint_mark_as_closed_info: The record will not show up in the overview once all required roles have closed, however it will still be found using the filter.
record.create_identifier_hint: e.g. name, DOB, casenumber, aid / asset id, name etc. Ending with a timestamp, this will be reused instead of being appended.
record.create_identifier_info: Create an identifier that will connect database entries. A current timestamp will be added by default. On submitting you will receive a prepared PDF-file to print out scannable codes. You can scan an existing identifier to recreate a label sheet.
record.create_identifier_proceed: Open the link, print the identifiers and use them where applicable.

Matching data has been imported. Please verify and be aware of your resposibility for accuracy. Only the most recent data for the corresponding field will be inserted.

Make sure to have the correct identifier before submitting!

6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.5 kompliziertes oder verwirrendes Steuersystem
6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.6 zweifelhafter oder unklarer Zustand des Gerätes

6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.7 zweifelhafte oder unklare Darstellung von Einstellungen, Messergebnissen oder anderen Angaben
6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.8 fehlerhafte Darstellung von Ergebnissen
6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.9 ungenügende Sichtbarkeit, Hörbarkeit oder Berührbarkeit

6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.10 ungenügende Darstellung von Steuervorgängen bezogen auf die Betätigung oder von angezeigten Angaben gegenüber dem tatsächlichen Zustand

6 Ungeeignete, unzulängliche oder zu komplizierte Schnittstelle mit dem Anwender (Kommunikation zwischen Mensch und Maschine) 6.11 widersprechende Modi oder Darstellungen im Vergleich zu bereits vorhandenen Angaben

7 Gefährdungen infolge von Funktionsfehlern, falscher Wartung und Alterung und beitragende Faktoren 7.2 fehlende oder unzureichende Spezifikationen für die Wartung einschließlich unzureichender Spezifikation für Funktionsprüfung nach der Wartung

B. zunehmender Verschluss von Flüssigkeits-oder Gasleitungen, oder Veränderungen des Strömungswiderstandes oder der elektrischen Leitfähigkeit) als Ergebnis widerholten Gebrauchs

chunk.content_hint:
Type replacement: for personalized chunks please adhere to syntax, each within a new line: :genus
Type text: within text chunks any undefined :PLACEHOLDER will generate an input field.

chunk.error_chunk_not_found: Chunk :name could not be found in database, please try something else.
chunk.hidden_hint: Hidden chunks are not displayed within the selection of latest chunks above. Hidden chunks may mess up templates, please adjust these as well.
chunk.insert_name: Insert replacement on cursor position or selection (for text type)
chunk.name: Name
chunk.name_hint: :Name to be replaced with the given value later. Use only text and number characters.
chunk.saved: The chunk named :name has been saved.

template.error_template_not_found: Template :name could not be found in database, please try something else.
template.hidden_hint: Hidden templates are not displayed within the selection of latest chunks above and unreachable for users.
template.name: Name
template.not_saved_missing: Template could not been saved, please provide a name, language and content!
template.saved: The template named :name has been saved.

use.template: Text, tap or click to copy

calculator.cd_hint: Distance between holes around a cylinder

calculator.pow_hint: e.g. resin mixing 70/30, decimal point is allowed

user.add_training_evaluation_unreasonable: Evaluation is unreasonable, this is a mandatory training.
user.add_training_hint: Without a training title other edits are ignored. Training date will be set to today if not provided. Expiry, experience points and file are optional.
user.display_orderauth: You have an order authorization pin. Ask administration for details.
user.error_forbidden_name: The name :name is not allowed or already taken, please use another.
user.error_not_found: User :name could not be found in database, please try something else.
user.name: Name
user.permissions_hint: Select either user or group. Group accounts do not have access to timesheets, filling out documents, product incorporation or MDR sample checks.
user.settings_annual_vacation_hint:
YYYY-MM-DD days within every new line
First entry recommended with start date of tracking and left days on this date, earlier entries will be ignored
user.settings_initial_overtime: Overtime hours on starting time tracking
user.settings_weekly_hours_hint:
YYYY-MM-DD hours within every new line
First entry recommended with start date of tracking, earlier entries will not be calculated
user.take_photo: Take a photo for your profile
user.take_photo_hint: This photo is public to all users, e.g. in messages
user.units_hint: e.g. only orders from the selected units appear for this user
user.welcome_message:
Hello :name,
welcome to the :appname. A brief summary:
Your contact persons for your units are :supervisor, regarding QM :qmo and in questions of product safety you'll get support by :prrc. A detailed list is available at :register

On :landingpage you will find a compact manual for your available functions.
In case you want to know which settings apply to you, check out :profile. You can set some own options too.

If you have questions regarding the app, please contact :admin.
I hope the app does make things easier at work, good luck!
